pullrequest.title: fix Link::AddTorque for Simbody and Bullet, with test

content.raw:
There seem to be two parts:

* fix for Link::AddTorque for Simbody and Bullet, with test (as title suggests). This is ok, though I think the test could be more thorough in applying torque along multiple axes at once.
* template for an integration test. I think this could go in a separate pull request.
content.html:
There seem to be two parts:

  • fix for Link::AddTorque for Simbody and Bullet, with test (as title suggests). This is ok, though I think the test could be more thorough in applying torque along multiple axes at once.
  • template for an integration test. I think this could go in a separate pull request.
